Item ID25422

Bleached bones are an untradeable drop from Undead Zealots. They can be burned at the Altar of the Damned to recharge a player's prayer points to full like a regular altar.

Players can bury bleached bones for 4.5 Prayer xp. Unlike long and curved bones, there is no warning that prevents the players from accidentally burying the bones. Alternatively, players can turn bleached bones into bonemeal at the Ectofuntus.

[[File:Bleached bones detail.png|left|120px]]
'''Bleached bones''' are an untradeable drop from [[Undead Zealot]]s. They can be burned at the [[Altar of the Damned]] to recharge a player's prayer points to full like a regular altar.

Players can bury bleached bones for 4.5 [[Prayer]] xp. Unlike [[long bone|long]] and [[curved bone]]s, there is no warning that prevents the players from accidentally burying the bones. Alternatively, players can turn bleached bones into [[bonemeal]] at the [[Ectofuntus]].
